trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have done it! This prestigious award is reserved for only the most dedicated and skilled players, proving that you have truly conquered the game and stand among the elite.

Successfully complete the game's tutorial and finish the final steps in the garage to unlock this trophy. This will help familiarize you with the game mechanics and prepare you for more challenging tasks ahead.

Earn this trophy by changing your tires for the first time. To do so, navigate to the tires section in the game, and purchase new tires or replace your worn-out tires. This milestone marks your first step towards mastering your car's performance.

Unlock this trophy by customizing your car's color. Head to the garage, open the styling section, and choose a unique color for your car, showcasing your personality and style on the virtual racetrack.

Earn this trophy by upgrading your car for the first time. Open the garage, select styling, and purchase one of the available auto parts. This marks the beginning of your journey to transform your car into a powerhouse.
Access Level 10 in the career mode and successfully complete it. To achieve this, go to the garage, open race, and select career. This demonstrates your progress and commitment to your racing career.

Unlock this trophy by repairing your car for the first time. In the garage, open the repair section, which is located next to the settings, and fix your vehicle. This shows that you are ready to maintain your car and keep it in peak condition.

Complete all races in the first day of the Chinese New Year event. Go to the garage, open race, and select the middle button for Chinese New Year. Conquer all the races to showcase your expertise and determination.

Win the first boss race in the game. Open the garage, go to race, select event, and win the first race on the list. This feat proves your ability to overcome challenging opponents and solidifies your status as a true racer.
Purchase the Mini car by opening the garage, selecting dealership, and buying the iconic compact car. This trophy signifies your expanding car collection and appreciation for automotive classics.
Reach and complete Level 30 in career mode. Open the garage, go to race, select levels, and win 30 levels to demonstrate your prowess and racing aptitude.

Complete the three-day missions by opening the garage, going to race, selecting the middle option, and successfully finishing all missions for day 3. This trophy highlights your dedication to the game and your ability to complete time-sensitive challenges.

Upgrade your Mini car to master status. Open the garage, go to dealership, select your Mini, and toggle it to Master. This accomplishment showcases your commitment to maximizing your vehicle's potential.
Collect 10 different cars by earning money and visiting the dealership. This trophy highlights your passion for automobiles and your dedication to building an impressive collection.
Upgrade your first car to legend status. Open the garage, select a random car, and upgrade it to legend to show that you've taken your first car to its maximum potential.

Complete 50 levels in the open gameplay mode. Open the garage, go to race, select levels, and win 50 levels to showcase your exceptional racing skills and your ability to consistently conquer various challenges.

Pass 80 levels in the open gameplay mode. Open the garage, go to race, select levels, and win 80 levels to demonstrate your mastery ofthe game and your unwavering commitment to achieving racing greatness.

Complete all levels in the open gameplay mode. Open the garage, go to race, select levels, and win all levels successfully. This tremendous accomplishment establishes you as a true champion in the racing world.

Purchase the high-performance Agera car. Open the garage, select dealership, choose the Agera car, and buy it. This trophy signifies your appreciation for top-tier vehicles and your desire to own the most powerful machines on the track.

Spend 3 continuous hours playing the game, immersing yourself in the virtual racing world and sharpening your skills. This trophy highlights your dedication and commitment to becoming the best racer you can be.
Defeat all bosses in the event mode. Open the garage, go to event, and win all races to prove that no challenge is too great and no opponent is too fierce for you to overcome.

Successfully complete the final day of the Chinese New Year event. Open the garage, go to Chinese New Year, and pass all races on the last day, showcasing your ability to persevere and triumph in time-limited events.
